description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Radiant

Standard

Reach 2

+16 vs AC; 2d8+4 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+16 vs AC; 2d8+4 damage.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Standard

The dragon teleports 5 squares, makes a claw attack, teleports 5 squares, and makes a claw attack against a different target.

Recharge 5-6

Minor, Recharge

Reach 2

+14 vs Fortitude; 2d8+6 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Radiant

Standard

Close blast 5

+14 vs Reflex; 2d6+4 radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it.

Encounter ✦ Radiant, Teleportation

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets up to four enemies; +14 vs Reflex; 2d8+4 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 radiant damage and is dazed (save ends both). Effect: The dragon teleports to a space in the burst.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +14 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When the dragon is hit by an attack

The dragon gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the dragon teleports 6 squares.

system.biography:
HP 444; Bloodied 222 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 15 radiant 		Init +13 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 25Fort 23Ref 25Will 23
Speed 8, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 12, teleport 10
Ability ScoresStr 18 (+9)
Con 15 (+7)		Dex 23 (+11)
Int 16 (+8)		Wis 18 (+9)
Cha 16 (+8)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Diplomacy +13, History +13, Insight +14, Intimidate +13, Religion +13Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 19 | Insight 24
